7.ara-name: كتاب الزكاة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abdullah bin Amr narrated that :the Prophet said: "Charity is not lawful for the rich nor for the physically fit

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ مَنْ لاَ تَحِلُّ لَهُ الصَّدَقَةُ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About: For Whom Charity Is Not Lawful
